member.name: M:Fake.SQL.SqlServer.RunScriptsFromDirectory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Runs all sql scripts from the given directory on the server.
member.param: Used to open the connection to the database.
All *.sql files inside this directory and all subdirectories will be run.

member.summary: Runs the given sql scripts on the server.
member.param: Used to open the connection to the database.
The scripts which will be run.

member.param: Used to open the connection to the database.

member.name: M:Fake.SQL.SqlServer.ReplaceDatabaseFilesWithCache(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.AttachOptions)
member.summary: Replaces the database files from a cache. If the files in the cache are not up to date, they will be refreshed.
member.param: Used to open the connection to the database.
The directory where the attached files will live.
The file cache. If the files in the cache are not up to date, they will be refreshed.
